sentences.en: An upswing for the company will benefit us all.
sentences.cn: 公司的兴隆将使我们大家都受益.

sentences.en: Another 47 % upswing in 1971 led to a long , choppy decline of more than 37 %.
sentences.cn: 1971年,道琼斯指数涨了47%,之后却经历了一场漫长振荡的下滑, 跌幅超过37%.

sentences.en: East Asian economic integration and regional cooperation has been experiencing an upswing in the past decade.
sentences.cn: 东亚经济一体化和区域性合作在过去的十年持续增长.

sentences.en: Economists in the survey are predicting a slow upswing for the economy as a whole.
sentences.cn: 受访经济学家预测,整体经济将缓慢好转.

sentences.en: For investors seeking signs an upswing, payrolls will be Friday's more - telling figure.
sentences.cn: 对那些寻找经济回升迹象的投资者而言,非农就业人数将是周五最有说服力的数据.

sentences.en: For sure, there will be an upswing, but not at the same pace as before.
sentences.cn: 可以肯定的是, 市况将再次兴盛起来, 但步伐难以如前一样.

sentences.en: German companies are present on all international growth markets and can profit from this upswing.
sentences.cn: 德国公司在所有国际增长市场上都有业务,所以,可以从本轮复苏中获利.

sentences.en: Many analysts considered the upswing in trading a technical rally.
sentences.cn: 许多分析人士认为交易价格上升不过是技术性反弹.

sentences.en: Market ready upswing as sign indicate.
sentences.cn: 有迹象表明,行市准备上升.

sentences.en: Shocking crimes are now on the upswing.
The economy is in the upswing which makes high tech services in more demand too.
sentences.cn: 经济在蓬勃发展,这就使对高科技服务的需求量也在加大.

sentences.en: These are the upswing of the business cycle.
sentences.cn: 这就是商业周期的上行区间.

sentences.en: This welcome economic upswing is accompanied by rising equity and property prices.
sentences.cn: 伴随着这种颇受欢迎的经济增长,是股票和房地产价格的不断上涨.

sentences.en: Those who doubt the sustainability of the upswing note, above all, it was technical in nature.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是,那些怀疑经济增长持续性的人注意到上述情况在本质上来讲是理论性的.

sentences.en: Violent crime is on the upswing.

trans.tran_en: An upswing is a sudden improvement in something such as an economy, or an increase in an amount or level
